long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the chrome extension that helps you stay connected to your faith while you work or navigate the internet. Our extension serves as a small companion for your daily dhikr, reminding you to pause and reflect throughout the day. With our simple and intuitive interface, you can set reminders for specific times and receive notifications to keep you on track. No matter where you are or what you're doing, our extension is here to help you stay connected to your faith and uplift your spirit. So why wait? Download our extension today and make dhikr a part of your daily routine.
